statements: DELETE FROM MedicalDeviceData WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND blood_pressure = 'Normal';
DELETE FROM MedicalDeviceData WHERE patient_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' AND created_at < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE record_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate < 60);
DELETE FROM VitalSigns WHERE patient_id = 105 AND heart_rate < 60;
DELETE FROM Alerts WHERE patient_id = 101 AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VitalSigns WHERE heart_rate > 100 AND timestamp < '2022-02-15';
